file.name: negative4.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Simple API Overview
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  "/pets":
    get:
      description: Returns all pets from the system that the user has access to
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A list of pets.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  "$ref": "#/components/schemas/pet"
      security:
        - api_key: []
        - petstore_auth:
            - write:pets
            - read:pets
components:
  securitySchemes:
    api_key:
      type: apiKey
      name: api_key
      in: header
    petstore_auth:
      type: oauth2
      flows:
        implicit:
          authorizationUrl: http://example.org/api/oauth/dialog
          scopes:
            write:pets: modify pets in your account
            read:pets: read your pets
